room_title: Escape room "Creepy Lair" by Mastermind Room Escape in St. Louis
room_description: You find yourselves trapped in a serial killer's creepy lair. He has taken you hostage and plans to get rid of you... but first, he has to run to the hardware store to purchase supplies. This could be your chance to slip through his fingers! Act fast, work together as a team and avoid becoming his next victims!
